sentence: Cheney's team also criticized a separate deal struck by Wyoming GOP chairman Frank Eathorne and the national party that would enable the RNC to fund Cheney's primary challenger, Harriet Hageman, using a longstanding party rule known as Rule 11.
author: Gabby Orr
title: In censure of Cheney and Kinzinger, RNC calls events of January 6 'legitimate political discourse'

sentence: Cheney's team also criticized a separate deal struck by Wyoming GOP chairman Frank Eathorne and the national party that would enable the RNC to fund Cheney's primary challenger, Harriet Hageman, using a longstanding party rule known as Rule 11.
